entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming clear late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
